p: We generated haplotype networks using Network 4.6 and the median-joining (MJ) method [ 63]. BAPS5 (Bayesian Analysis of Population Structure, [ 64]) was employed to verify population structure. We ran the mixture model setting the maximum possibility of clusters [ 64]. The genetic distance between clusters identified in BAPS5 and between clusters composed for sequences with distribution between the rivers (Oiapoque–Maroni; Araguari–Oiapoque, Jari–Araguari, and Jari–Trombetas) ( Fig 1). Genetic distance was calculated using MEGA 6.0 [ 53].
